entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 30%
